endorserDid.description: The unique identifier for the external endorser, required if `endorserDid` is provided.

endorserName.description: The name of the external endorser. It is required if either `endorserDid` or `endorserInvitationURL` is provided.

lobOrganizationName.description: Name of the Organization registering the LOB

lobRole.description: Specify the role of the LOB. Allowed Values: HOLDER, ISSUER, VERIFIER

lobTenancy.description: Specify if the agent is a single-wallet agent or if it supports multiple wallets. Allowed Values: SINGLE, MULTI_TENANT

didMethod.description: Specify the DID Method of the LOB. Allowed Values: did:web, did:sov

lobProtocol.description: Specify the message protocol that the LOB supports. Allowed Values: AIP2_0, OID4VC

writeLedgerId.description: If the DID of the LOB is a did:sov, please specify the ledger on which the DID will be stored. Allowed value is 1 (points to BCovrin ledger)

credentialFormat.description: Specify the credential format that the LOB supports. Allowed Values: ANONCREDS, JSON_LD and SD_JWT

lobTrustUrl.description: The Trust URL associated with the Lob Issuer, providing a link to the issuer’s trust information.

lobTrustAPIKey.description: The Trust API Key associated with the Lob Issuer, providing a link to the issuer’s trust information.

lobExternalEndorser.description: Indicates whether the Lob Issuer has its own external endorser. If true, the `endorserDetails` field must also be provided.

endorserDetails.description: External endorser information. This is required when `lobExternalEndorser` is true.
